title: 服务器后台报Error
author: Danking
txt_content:

replies.author: qpan3566
replies.txt_content: 应该是插件的检查更新失败吧

replies.author: mawlan
replies.txt_content: 你的服务器是1.8么，这个插件是1.8的，如果一样，那就应该是升级update出的错，你把配置里面的update关了试试！

replies.author: Danking
replies.txt_content:
